name: Wizard Within
description: This is my entry for the 43rd gm(48). Gm(48) is a game jam where you use a community-selected theme and Gamemaker Studio 2 to create a game in less than 48 hours. The theme of this jam was 'spellcasting'. Use WASD to move, spacebar to interact, and mouse cursor to draw/cast spells. There are a total of four spells to find.
